game.name: Puzzle Brain
game.description:
Online puzzle and memory games are a first choice to kill time for many players. If you also love to be a part of a classic puzzle challenge, then you must try out Puzzle Brain that is a combination of tricky puzzles and memory test. No matter which age group you belong to, this brand new arcade game can help a lot when it comes to passing your free hours. Give it a try to challenge your visual memory and prove the world that you are an ultimate puzzle solver!
When you click the play button, you would notice 9 cubes on the screen. Now 3 cats will be displayed for a few seconds on any of the three squares and get disappeared. Your job is to memorize the cat faces on that cubes or squares and spot their correct pattern. Be careful and try to be fast to complete task shortly. Choosing the wrong pattern can through you out of the game and you can see your final score on the screen then!
This html5 puzzle challenge includes a series of brain teasers and the number of cubes and cats will keep increasing as you progress. Be prepared to challenge your mind by testing different riddles and tricky tests! Think out of the box to complete all levels in the shortest possible time! Track your new best score on the top left corner of the screen! Good luck to bring your new brain-pushing experience! We have countless tricky and mind-blowing brain teasers to play through and provide you with the best quality gaming entertainment, no download required.
